title: Emerald Radiance Diamond Jhumka - Pachala Rallu Vaira Jhumka
materials: South Sea Pearl. Features a fine Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Intricate filigree work surrounding the emerald. The diamond-studded heart shaped design leads to the classic Jhumka bell shape with detailed openwork pattern and pearl drops. Traditional Temple design influences.
colors: Predominantly Gold and Diamond white with a vibrant Emerald green. Soft pearl accents enhance the regal look.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Ideal for Muhurtham
and other traditional South Indian events. Also suitable for upscale modern gatherings where a touch of heritage is desired.
description: A timeless piece showcasing exceptional craftsmanship and combining traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The vibrant emerald adds a touch of royalty, while the brilliant diamonds provide unmatched sparkle. The pearl drops create graceful movement and enhance the Jhumka's overall allure. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting shine and durability.
